data.name: Capture The Flag
data.detailed_description:
Capture the Flag is a team based game where the object is to steal the other teams flag and take it to your base. First team to score a certain amount of flags wins!

Players can "tag" each other by capturing enemies in their scoop net.

If you can't beat 'em, Squash 'em!


Playing nice not getting you anywhere? test your luck and receive powers of epic proportions with Lucky Buttons!

Outrun all your enemies and friends, shoot someone with a banana pistol, become invisible and so much more

We take no responsibility towards any negative side-effects or collateral damage Lucky Buttons may cause, use Lucky Buttons at your own discretion!

data.short_description: Team up in epic 4v4 battles in this unique spin on the classic sport/gamemode!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2400 / AMD CPU with 4 physical cores @ 3Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 670 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
